text: The 1989 West Coast Athletic Conference Men's Basketball Tournament (now West Coast Conference) was held at the War Memorial Gymnasium at the University of San Francisco in San Francisco, This was the third edition of the tournament. The top two seeds were defeated in the Third-seeded Loyola Marymount defeated #5 seed in the championship game, in overtime, to repeat as WCAC tournament The Lions received the automatic bid to the 64-team NCAA Tournament as the twelfth seed in the Midwest regional. Regular-season champion received an at- large bid and were seeded eighth in the West regional; both teams lost in the first round. ==Bracket== * – Denotes overtime period ==References== Category:West Coast Conference Men's Basketball Tournament Category:1988–89 West Coast Athletic Conference men's basketball season
title: 1989 West Coast Athletic Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
